page.title: 12THURLASTON POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office is in the centre of Thurlaston and is the only shop in the village.Many people go to Duncurch, Rugby and Leamington but many still use the village post office for small items.Its busiest times are Thursday morning and Friday evening.They order 72 papers each Sunday,the most popular being "THE TIMES". There is also a dry cleaning service which is well used. The Post Office has the only post box in the village. The people who own it have only lived there for a year after a long tradition of a local family passing it on.They like the village and think the people are friendly. Some villagers come in "just for a chat"!
